title: Episode Seventeen: A Nation in Arms
description:
Napoleon finally reports to the regular army, just as France sinks deeper into chaos. The Jacobins come to power and launch The Reign of Terror. The army continues to transform. Napoleon finally achieves some success writing, and wins some powerful friends in the process.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
